seo.message: Page is not indexed by Google.
seo.recommendation: Ensure the page is not blocked by robots.txt and does not have a 'noindex' tag. Submit the URL to Google Search Console for indexing.

seo.message: The meta title is too short (under 30 characters).
seo.recommendation: Extend the meta title to be between 50-60 characters to improve click-through rates.

seo.message: The meta description is a duplicate of another page.
seo.recommendation: Write a unique meta description for this page to avoid confusion and improve SERP appearance.

seo.message: The target keyword appears in the URL.
seo.recommendation: This is good practice. No action needed.

readability.message: Over 25% of sentences contain more than 20 words.
readability.recommendation: Shorten long sentences to make the content easier to read and understand.

readability.message: The Flesch reading ease score is 65, which is good.
readability.recommendation: The content is easily understandable by most people.

technical.message: The page returns a 404 (Not Found) error.
technical.recommendation: Restore the page or implement a 301 redirect to a relevant, live page.

technical.message: An image is missing its alt text attribute.
technical.recommendation: Add descriptive alt text to the image to improve accessibility and image SEO.

technical.message: The page uses insecure HTTP instead of HTTPS.
technical.recommendation: Migrate the page to HTTPS to ensure security and build user trust.

engagement.message: The page does not contain a clear call-to-action (CTA).
engagement.recommendation: Add a button or link that encourages the user to take the next step (e.g., 'Sign Up', 'Learn More').
